sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BBS (BBS_SN, CATEGORY, SUBJECT, CONTENTS, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, VIEWCNT, DELETE_AT, SECRET_AT, POPUP_AT, STARTDT, ENDDT , SUBCATEGORY, PARENT_BBS_SN, POPUP_WIDTH, POPUP_HEIGHT) SELECT NVL(MAX(BBS_SN), 0) + 1, #category#, #subject#, #contents#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, 0, 'N', 'N', #popup_at#, #startdt#, #enddt# , #subcategory#, #parent_bbs_sn#, #popup_width#, #popup_height# FROM TB_BBS
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_BBS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' WHERE BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#

UPDATE TB_BBS SET SUBJECT = #subject#, CONTENTS = #contents#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, SECRET_AT = 'N' , SUBCATEGORY = #subcategory#, POPUP_AT = #popup_at#, STARTDT = #startdt#, ENDDT = #enddt# , POPUP_WIDTH = #popup_width#, POPUP_HEIGHT = #popup_height# WHERE BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.BBS_SN, B.CATEGORY, B.SUBJECT, B.CONTENTS, B.WRITNG_ID, B.VIEWCNT , U.USER_NM AS USER_NM, SECRET_AT, U.EMAIL AS EMAIL, TO_CHAR(B.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT , B.SUBCATEGORY, B.POPUP_AT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.STARTDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STARTDT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ENDDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENDDT , B.POPUP_WIDTH, B.POPUP_HEIGHT FROM TB_BBS B INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON B.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID WHERE B.BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#

SELECT B.BBS_SN, B.SUBJECT, TO_CHAR(B.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT FROM ( SELECT BBS_SN FROM TB_BBS WHERE CATEGORY = 'N' AND DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY BBS_SN DESC ) A INNER JOIN TB_BBS B ON A.BBS_SN = B.BBS_SN WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT BBS_SN, SUBJECT, CONTENTS, POPUP_WIDTH, POPUP_HEIGHT FROM TB_BBS WHERE CATEGORY = 'N' AND DELETE_AT = 'N' AND POPUP_AT = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT ORDER BY BBS_SN
